question.content: Choose the departure city, try to say Florence
Choose the arrival city, try to say Milan
Choose the flight type, choose between one way or return

prompt.content: Say ok to submit the form
Say one to book the flight
Say two to book the flight
Say home to go to the home page

vocal_feedback.content: You choose the following optional services

prompt.content: Say book to book the flight
Say home to go to the home page

text.string: Congratulation you have book the flight

speech.content: Congratulation you have book the flight
